data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Li, Xuankun, Yang, Ding (2014): Mucha Ozerov and Ortalischema Frey newly recorded from China with descriptions of two new species (Diptera, Sepsidae). Zootaxa 3815 (2): 249-262, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3815.2.5
